questions.question: Rose uses store cards when she ______________ items. Her favourite shop often has _____________ . Some of her schoolmates work in shops and they _______________ her, which she thinks is nice. She often gets good ___________.

Their day begins in a coffee shop. ‘We have frappuccino coffees and chat,’ Olivia says. ____________________ ‘We like finding the latest fashions on Pinterest or Instagram.’ Like adults, many teens want good value for money. ‘If there’s something new I want, but it’s too expensive, like these cool trainers I saw the other day, I won’t get them till they’re on sale a few weeks later.
options: There are plenty of second-hand websites, too, where stuff’s even cheaper
+While they’re there, they also do some online shopping
You can get refunds online but it takes longer.
Some people I know send everything back.

questions.question: Find the word with the following meaning: very interested in or enthusiastic about something.
Olivia, 16, is going into town with ______________ friends.
How _______________ money were they in the shop?
This book isn’t _______________ – it’s so boring. I won’t finish it.
What colors are the trainers that the speaker bought for themselves?
The speaker chose to buy pink trainers like their friends.
Which of the following statements is true?
options: +The speaker received a 10% discount due to a promotion.
The speaker bought a pair of Bluetooth headphones at the store.
The speaker prefers shopping online rather than in the store.
The speaker's friend is saving up for a new phone.

questions.question: After hearing the bad news, she felt very worried ____________ what might happen next.
She was delighted ____________ her own performance in the competition; she had worked hard and knew she did well.
She is really good __________ playing the piano; she has been practicing for years and performs beautifully.
After reading the author's unique perspective on life, she felt truly inspired ______ and wanted to write her own stories.
She was eager ______ the opportunity to apply for her dream job, as it aligned perfectly with her skills and interests.
She is highly skilled______ graphic design, having worked on various projects for many years.
Find the word with the following meaning: making you feel angry.
Find the word with the following meaning: having a natural ability to do something.
Find the word with the following meaning: being easily upset by things other people say or do to you.
According to Dr. Carley, what chemical is produced when we receive hugs, making us feel good?
Which of the following statements is true?
options: Hugging makes us produce serotonin, which makes us feel happy.
Smiling at your friends makes them frown.
+Both real friends and online friends help us in different ways.
Chatting with your best friends doesn’t affect your gestures or words.

questions.question: What runs all around a backyard, yet never moves?
Which is heavier: a ton of bricks or a ton of feathers?
Two in a corner, one in a room, zero in a house, but one in a shelter. What is it?
What 4-letter word can be written forward, backward or upside down, and can still be read from left to right?
Find the sentence half: Jackie is keen __________________
options: in making music in the school band.
about playing online games with her friends.
+on going to football matches with friends

questions.question: The girls enjoyed _______________ a presentation together for their English class.
Pablo is interested in __________________ more articles about friendship in the 21st century.
Correct the mistakes in the sentence: Play a musical instrument is fun.
options: Play a musical instrument is fun
To play a musical instrument is fun
To playing a musical instrument is fun

questions.question: How many food halls does Westfield, White City have?
Which of the following statements is true about Westfield, White City?
options: Westfield, White City has five food halls.
The shopping centre is the size of 10 football pitches.
There are 50 different places to eat at Westfield, White City.
+Westfield, White City has a 14-screen cinema where you can watch films.
